issue.title: [CF 1324] Option to Hide Groups in Config Mode
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using now? ("The latest" is not a version)

v8.2.0

What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Allow the option to hide specific groups while in config mode. This could simply be a checkbox in the Group tab.

Please provide any additional information below.

I have a lot of groups I use purely for notifications in 5-man dungeons. It would be nice to be able to have them hidden so they do not clutter up my screen when I am modifying my combat-related TMW's. If I need to modify them after hiding, I can simply select them in the Group Select dropdown and uncheck the hide option.

Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Zinodax | Imported from CurseForge issue #1324 | Raw
